com.textEditor.core

Class Core

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.textEditor.core.Core
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.textEditor.core.CoreInterface

    public class Core
extends java.util.Observable
implements com.textEditor.core.CoreInterface
    Core class Manage all the operation execution and notify observers when states have changed

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Core.InternalGui
      Nested class to allow show buffer and clipboard content while using the interface For test purpose only
